alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 1:17AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lewis and eastern Oswego Counties through 145 AM EDT... At 116 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Central Square, or 14 miles west of Camden, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Central Square, Redfield, Highmarket, Richland, West Monroe, Williamstown, Lyonsdale, Orwell, Port Leyden, Lyons Falls, Parish, Altmar, Constableville, Osceola, Amboy Center, West Leyden, Mohawk Hill, Swancott Mill, Howardville and Mallory. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 32 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
